name: smallwalk
description:
take a short walk with a new friend

learn the meaning of life

and shapes o rama

wasd + mouse to move and look

space or e or enter to advance dialogue

1-4 to select dialogue options

ray marching code & algorithms derived from work by Inigo Quillez, CodeParade, and The Art of Code

storm sounds from https://freesound.org/people/cosmingurau/sounds/460449/
